comments.author: Fundamentals Of
comments.body: To diversify is to avoid putting all your eggs in one basket. Diversification to a certain extent means safety. Whatever happens to a single coin, it won't drag your entire portfolio. So diversification is the opposite of gambling or risking all your worth in one single coin. ETH must be a good choice but diversification is a lot better especially because going all in into ETH means you left behind Bitcoin which is undoubtedly the most important choice of all. I advise you to diversify to a few solid coins. Bitcoin of course should always be part of your portfolio. You may add ETH or XMR or LTC.
